title: Roast parsnip and sweet potato medley
ingredients: ['450g sweet potatoes, cut into long thin rectangles', '1 large carrot, cut into long thin rectangles', '1 large parsnip, cut into long thin rectangles', 'olive oil, as needed for cooking', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '4 sprigs fresh thyme', '2 tablespoons maple syrup, or to taste']
